element.title: No approval required
The following approvals are required:
Supervisor approval
Direct supervisor only
element.description: For direct supervisor approval to take effect in a course application, the "Direct supervisors" attribute of the applicant's user profile must have been set.
element.title: First by direct supervisor, then by group supervisor(s)
element.description: For group supervisor approval to take effect in a course application, the "Highest approval group" attribute of the applicant's user profile must have been set.
element.title: Training administrator approval
